alert.note: Alert for Bee; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 8:32PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ARANSAS... NORTHEASTERN SAN PATRICIO...SOUTHWESTERN REFUGIO AND SOUTHEASTERN BEE COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM CDT... At 832 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Quintana to near West Sinton. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Sinton, Refugio, Woodsboro, Odem, St. Paul, Bayside, Quintana, Papalote, and Bonnie View. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 610 and 628. US Highway 183 between mile markers 666 and 668. US Highway 77 between mile markers 612 and 654. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio
